Just introduced my first bill - H.R. 1424, the Fallen Warrior Battlefield Cross Memorial Act! These soldiers gave everything for our nation and there will never be enough we can do or say to thank them in return. More here: https://anthonygonzalez.house.gov/media/press-releases/rep-gonzalez-drops-first-bill-taking-stand-those-who-gave-ultimate-sacrifice …

Proud to announce my office is currently seeking a wounded or disabled veteran for a two-year paid fellowship in my North Canton Office through the Wounded Warrior Fellowship Program. Check out the link here for details on how to apply!  https://www.usajobs.gov/GetJob/ViewDetails/498817200# …

We need to bring real competition to our credit industry to hold bureaus accountable and help extend credit to more people. Innovative technologies like machine learning can help us get there. Check out my Q&A from yesterday's @financecmte hearing here: https://youtu.be/42HZMyJLkaw?t=12206 …

Northeast Ohio had a major victory tonight with the passage of important legislation to help fund the Ohio & Erie Canalway and protect this historic national heritage area. Proud to have supported this legislation to protect one of Northeast Ohio's treasures.

600+ startups have been formed through the various #ICORPS sites including at @uakron @UToledo , and my alma mater @OhioState. This bill safeguards our economy by empowering future entrepreneurs across our country to turn their wildest dreams into our collective achievements.

Yesterday I spoke on the House floor to support the Innovators and Entrepreneurs Act that will create jobs by expanding the #ICORPS program that helps innovators learn how to turn their research into new products and businesses. Proud to see this bipartisan bill pass the House.
My time to question today's witnesses in our @FinancialCmte hearing is coming up! Tune in here to watch: https://twitter.com/FinancialCmte/status/1100410410476265472 …

Today's mailbag comes from Steven in Middleburg Heights who asked me to support border security measures and fix our immigration system. Thank you Steven for your letter! This is an issue I've been talking a lot about. I hope you find this answer helpful:  https://youtu.be/K0m4CWohnoE

This week we had our first district work week since I was sworn in as your congressman. Felt great to be back home for a whole week and hear from you all in person on issues that matter most. Watch my #WeeklyRundown here for an update on the week: https://youtu.be/qNDvuuCVFZQ

This bill does not question where one stands on the pro-life debate. This bill simply states that all children born in this country deserve the same protections under the law. It is that simple, and it should pass unanimously.

As a new father, it is hard to imagine a world in which the killing of a newborn child is acceptable, let alone legal in our country. The Born Alive Abortion Survivors Protection Act should not be a partisan bill. It is common sense.

This week's #mondaymailbag comes from James, a 15- year-old from Medina who wants to know how to become a Congressman when he grows up. There's no one path to become a congressman, but I hope this advice helps. Thanks for writing in! https://youtu.be/KbwrU9Yclxc

Veterans facing mental health challenges deserve the best possible care, and that includes eliminating barriers to access like childcare. I'm proud to have voted to require the VA to provide childcare to eligible vets while they receive mental health treatment at VA facilities. pic.twitter.com/5IlxSaqxt9

Today's #weeklyrundown includes my take on this week's #SOTU address plus today's vote to provide childcare for veterans seeking treatment at the VA. For more updates like this subscribe to my newsletter at  http://anthonygonzalez.house.gov : https://youtu.be/7cm_pudNjBY

The Great Lakes are a critical part of Northeast Ohio. Today I joined colleagues in introducing a bill to promote cutting edge research and ensure we have the knowledge and tools to keep our lakes and fisheries healthy for generations to come. More here:  https://anthonygonzalez.house.gov/media/press-releases/rep-gonzalez-joins-colleagues-introducing-bill-protect-great-lakes … pic.twitter.com/oxdyR3noAz

I'm encouraged to hear President Trump's call for unity and compromise here in Washington and across our nation. We need to work together to solve our nation's biggest issues. My full response to this evening's #SOTU below. pic.twitter.com/LfwMz0HdWt

Excited to be joined at my first #SOTU by my wife, Elizabeth, and my former football coach and longtime mentor @JimTressel5. Jim has always encouraged me to go where I thought I could be the most useful. For me, that was Congress. Proud to share this moment with him today. pic.twitter.com/75auCeRNFy

We need to ensure we are doing our jobs, and that means putting an end to government shutdowns or, at the very least, ensuring lawmakers are not paid in the event of one. It is time to make Washington work for the people again.

For me, this is simple: our government has a responsibility to the men and women of this country to come together and solve our big challenges. I have been working in a bipartisan manner here in Congress to do just that.

Starting my Congressional career in the midst of a partial government shutdown has made fixing our government even more of a top priority for me. I'm working in a bipartisan manner in Congress to end future shutdowns. Learn more about my work here:  https://anthonygonzalez.house.gov/media/press-releases/icymi-rep-gonzalez-taking-action-end-all-future-government-shutdowns … pic.twitter.com/UdonN7pfKR
